name: The Defence of Blynia (Demo)
description:
Welcome to the Defence of Blynia!

This is a very buggy version mainly designed to test generation

Controls:

WASD to move (Buggy), hold left click at a tree to break it (Buggy)

Close and then open thew project back up to generate a new world!

Credits:

Programmers

Modellers:
